ps block.name: Campus Gate
ps block.instruction: Move straight to reach security desk

ps block.name: Security Desk
ps block.instruction: Go straight to two wheeler parking

ps block.name: Two Wheeler Parking
ps block.instruction: Go straight to Principal and Admin block

ps block.name: Admin Block
ps block.alert: Speed breaker ahead. Walk slow and steady. Total steps on speed breaker is four

ps block.name: CS Block Front
ps block.info: If you cross in front of CS block, no need to cross the road

ps block.name: Turn Left Point
ps block.instruction: Turn left and go straight to notice board

ps block.name: Notice Board End
ps block.instruction: Move forward to arts block starting point

ps block.name: Arts Block Start
ps block.instruction: Go straight to arts block left gate

ps block.name: Arts Block Left Gate
ps block.instruction: Move forward to stone bench near canteen

ps block.name: Stone Bench Canteen
ps block.instruction: Go straight to PS block entrance

ps block.name: PS Block Entrance
ps block.alert: Slope ahead. Walk slow and steady

ps block.name: Lift
ps block.instruction: Enter the lift. Press first floor button on your right side

ps block.name: PS Block
ps block.instruction: You have successfully reached PS block
